title: Lily Allen and David Harbour make red carpet couple debut as romance heats up
text:
Lily and David have taken the next step (Picture: Backgrid; Splash)

Only a week ago, we weren’t even sure if Lily Allen and David Harbour were legit a thing.

But since then, the pair have been cramming in every celebrity couple milestone.

Lily supporting the actor at Saturday Night Live? Check. Plenty of PDA on the streets of New York? Check. Social media boasts? Yep, check.

And now, David, 44, and Lily, 34, have walked their first red carpet together.

Lily and David are believed to have started dating in August (Picture: Janet Mayer/Startraksphoto.com)

Quite the line-up (Picture: Roy Rochlin/Getty Images)

Lily accompanied the Stranger Things actor to the Skin Cancer Foundation’s Champagne for Change gala at New York’s swanky Plaza Hotel, and while they weren’t holding hands or tangling tongues for the cameras, it’s clear this romance is blossoming.

The Smile singer, dressed in a paisley ptinted dress and boots, stood alongside David, who looked dapper in a dark suit as they walked the red carpet at the gala.

Advertisement

The couple were joined by Avengers star Sebastian Stan, Katie Holmes, actress Dianne West and talent agent Adam Schweitzer, which is quite the eclectic dinner party.

Just your average photobomb by Katie Holmes (Picture: Janet Mayer/Startraksphoto.com)

Lily looked lovely in a printed frock (Picture: DARA / BACKGRID)

David and Lily had a bit of a matchy-matchy thing going, with both of them wearing teeny buns in their hair – which is basically as much of a statement as matching rings.

Right? Right?!

We first wondered what was going on between Lily and David back in August, when the unlikely pals were seen leaving a London theatre together.

Things stepped up a notch when the pair were seen enjoying the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at the O2 Arena.

David is best known for playing Hopper in Stranger Things (Picture: Janet Mayer/Startraksphoto.com)

Lily and David seem smitten (Picture: LRNYC / MEGA)

Lily, who has two daughters from her marriage to Sam Cooper, had been single since splitting from boyfriend of three years Meridian Dan, while David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts actress Alison Sudol earlier this year.

The couple seemed smitten as they enjoyed a shopping date in Manhattan earlier this week, planting kisses on each other and enjoying cuddles in the street.

And it looks like we have more Dilly (we’re working on it) antics to look forward to, as Lily said she would be leaving the UK until ‘after Brexit’.

We don’t blame her.
